text:
="preserve">Grant Cramer (born November 10, 1961) is an American actor and producer. He was born in Los Angeles, California.
His first big role came in the 1984 cult comedy movie "Hardbodies", in which he played Scotty Palmer. His other big movie was the 1988 cult classic "Killer Klowns from Outer Space". Other movie roles include appearances in "Mach 2" (2001) and "Follow the Prophet" (2009).
